verses.name: Isaiah 15:7
verses.text: Therefore the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have laid up, shall they carry away to the brook of the willows.

verses.name: Isaiah 15:8
verses.text: For the cry is gone round about the borders of Moab; the howling thereof unto Eglaim, and the howling thereof unto Beer–elim.

verses.name: Isaiah 15:9
verses.text: For the waters of Dimon shall be full of blood: for I will bring more upon Dimon, lions upon him that escapeth of Moab, and upon the remnant of the land.
